backend/main.mo: Motoko actor implementing access‑controlled user profiles and CRUD operations for products with ownership checks and migration support.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module converting old product records to the new schema by adding an anonymous owner field.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping features to associated files, components, tests, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Collection of auto‑generated summaries describing the purpose of each frontend file.
frontend/.env: Local development environment variables defining app name, slug, local network, and backend canister ID placeholder.
frontend/.env.production: Production environment variables for IC deployment including app branding, IC network target, and canister ID placeholder.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT.md: Deployment guide explaining prerequisites and steps for local and mainnet deployment of the app.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind-based OKLCH theme variables defining colors and styles for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading the React app with title and meta description for car care products.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app configuring TanStack Router routes, layout, and React Query provider.
frontend/src/components/AboutSection.tsx: About section component describing the brand with icons, feature highlights, and additional info.
frontend/src/components/BrandSection.tsx: Renders a brand header and grid of ProductCard components for a given brand.
frontend/src/components/BrandsSection.ts: Renders a section showcasing featured automotive brands with descriptive cards for Turtle Wax and 3M.
frontend/src/components/EmptyState.tsx: Displays a centered alert-style empty state with title, description, and optional action button.
frontend/src/components/HomeHero.tsx: Provides the homepage hero with marketing text and a large banner image for car care products.
frontend/src/components/ProductCard.tsx: Shows a product card with image, pricing, wishlist and cart interactions, and navigation to product detail.
frontend/src/components/SiteFooter.tsx: Renders the app footer with branding, copyright, and a link to caffeine.ai.
frontend/src/components/SiteHeader.tsx: Implements the site header with logo, navigation, mobile menu, and cart/wishlist counters.
frontend/src/config/branding.ts: Exports centralized branding values including app name, slug, and tagline.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user's Internet Identity and refreshes dependent queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useCart.ts: Provides cart state with add, update, remove, clear, and total calculation utilities stored in localStorage.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Handles Internet Identity auth lifecycle, exposing login, logout, identity, and status via context.
Hook for syncing React state to localStorage with safe read/write behavior.
frontend/src/hooks/useProduct.ts: Fetches a single product by ID using react-query and the actor API.
frontend/src/hooks/useProductMutations.t: Provides create, update, and delete product mutations with react-query and actor API, invalidating product queries on success.
frontend/src/hooks/useProducts.ts: Fetches all products using react-query and the actor API.
frontend/src/hooks/useWishlist.ts: Manages wishlist items in localStorage with add, remove, toggle, and count helpers.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and a custom green-yellow theme with light and dark mode variables.
frontend/src/lib/pricing.ts: Utilities for formatting INR amounts and computing discount percentages.
frontend/src/lib/productImages.ts: Maps known product brand/name pairs to static image paths and provides a lookup function.
frontend/src/lib/uploadedProductImages.t: Stores uploaded product image metadata and helpers to list and validate image paths.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentity providers and loads global styles.
frontend/src/pages/AllProductsPage.tsx: Displays all products with loading, error, and empty states, rendering a grid of ProductCards.
frontend/src/pages/CartPage.tsx: Shows cart items with quantity controls, totals, and checkout navigation.
frontend/src/pages/CheckoutPage.tsx: Handles checkout for single or cart mode with form validation, totals, and order placement.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Renders the homepage, loading products, grouping them by brand, and displaying hero, brand, and about sections with loading and error states.
frontend/src/pages/MyProductsPage.tsx: Provides an authenticated interface to create, edit, and delete products using form dialogs, validation, and product mutations.
frontend/src/pages/ProductDetailsPage.ts: Displays detailed product info with dynamic image handling, wishlist/cart actions, and loading/error states.
frontend/src/pages/WishlistPage.tsx: Shows wishlist items with options to view details, move items to cart, or remove them, handling empty states and image fallbacks.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, storing, and clearing URL and session-based parameters, including hash-routing support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending fonts, colors, containers, animations, and plugins for styling across the app.
project_state.json: Tracks project metadata, existing features, and state information for the Urban Wax Studio project. Contains versioning, deployment-related features, and configuration settings for build planning.
